attributes.action: Tell walkers to bring back cheese flavoured snaps!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we all remember the cheese flavoured snaps dont we, now i go to my local shop and all i see are the red flavour one's, this isn't acceptable, bring back yellow, bring back yellow!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
